descriptions: ["DescriptionTreo Homes is proud to offer this stunning type 2M 3 bedroom+maid+study villa in Alma 1, Arabian Ranches available for sale. The property offers a stunning landscaped garden with private entrance walking distance from the world class golf course. The ground floor features a large sized kitchen, dining room with a veranda, an ultra spacious living room opening up to the garden, maid's room+bathroom, and a laundry cabinet. The first floor offers a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, walk in closet, and a balcony overlooking the community. As well as two great bedrooms sharing a guest bathroom. Alma is always in high demand and is extremely popular with couples and families. Located within all Alma community is a shared swimming pool, tennis court, and children's play area. Type 2M3 bed+maid+studyWalk in closetLandscaped gardenDouble garageGolfing communityClose to community CentreCall Area Sales Manager Andrie Jackel today to book viewings in Alma and surrounding areas. The unit is rented at 150k till May 2020, please be advised before calling."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are thrilled to exclusively offer to market this stunning 1 Bedroom apartment in Cayan Tower, Dubai Marina for an incredible price of only AED 1,350,000.
This stunning 07 type layout boasts the following key features:
- Bright spacious living area
- 1 Large En-suite Bedroom
- Guest Powder Room
- Fully Open Style Fitted Kitchen
- Balcony
- Marina and Sea Views
- Not overlooking construction

Cayan Tower is an iconic 73 storey residential tower that spirals in a smooth curve by an astonishing 90 degrees to give every apartment a stunning views of the sea or Marina. Cayan’s dynamic twisting shape challenges conventional architecture and redefines standards of luxury. Situated in a key location at the mouth of Dubai Marina thus enjoying great views on to the Marina, sea and The Palm.
For more information and to organize a viewing on this incredible apartment please call Padraic on+971504644029 or email padraic@phrealestate.ae']
